message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $17,000. It's in excellent condition and worth every penny.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only willing to pay $15,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While I value your offer, I'm looking to get a bit closer to my asking price. How about $16,000? This would still be a good deal for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm still not able to go above $15,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
